channel.title: Friends list HELP?>?! ive tried everything..!?
channel.description:
Friends list error, i think its server sided because when i added people it will say (username) - Has logged in and it shows them offline on friendsl list it never shows them online when they log on.
and when there offline u cant message them but when there online you can mesage them it just says there offline
HELP? :mad:
